thread.title: PSG 4 Barcelona 0: L’Equipe player ratings hammer home just how bad Barca were | Metro News
thread.title_full: PSG 4 Barcelona 0: L’Equipe player ratings hammer home just how bad Barca were | Metro News

author: Simon Rice For Metro.Co.Uk
title: PSG 4 Barcelona 0: L’Equipe player ratings hammer home just how bad Barca were | Metro News
text:
Simon Rice for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 15 Feb 2017 9:21 am Barcelona stars Neymar and Messi in Paris (Getty) 
Barcelona were bad last night, but then you could probably tell that from the eye-catching 4-0 scoreline . 
The likes of Lionel Messi, Luis Suaez and Neymar were anonymous on this much-anticipated Champions League night against Paris St Germain. And the hosts in the French capital took full advantage, playing some scintillating football to kill the Round of 16 tie before the second leg. ‘How can Gibbs be captain?!’ Man Utd legend Roy Keane TEARS into Arsenal flops 
But just how bad Barcelona were was rammed home by influential French newspaper L’Equipe. The publication’s player ratings from the Parc de Princes didn’t hold back. 
Messi, Suarez, captain Andres Iniesta, Andre Gomes and Jordi Alba were all given a score of just 2/10. The only Barcelona player who emerged with a slither of credit was their goalkeeper, Marc-Andre Ter Stegen who was given 6/10.
